Name: Terracotta representing a satyr
Description: Satyr in walking position, supporting with his left arm a pitcher in teardrop form, while the right arm is down at his side, close to the body. He wears a conical cap and a short tunic, revealing the base of a large projecting phallus. The feet are broken, the back is smooth and the piece bears remnants of the preparatory ground in white. Solid.
